author: fabiocos
body: Back-port into 53X of the Pdf Weight code modifications introduced in order to allow to use one of the computed PDF sets as denominator for weight definition. Set also a protection to force PDF information to be written according to the LHAPDF parton code (i.e. gluon code must be 0 and not 21 as it is in sherpa).
title: 53X back-port of Pdf Weight modifications
